# Observation Log Template

Capture evidence from the dashboard walkthrough. Duplicate the table for every screen if needed.

| Label | Screen / Area | ISO 9241 Clause | What breaks? | Why it matters | Severity (H/M/L) |
|-------|---------------|-----------------|--------------|----------------|------------------|
| A     | Alerts drawer | 110 §5.3        | Critical alert hidden behind neutral icon | Analysts miss escalations during shift change | H |
|       |               |                 |              |                |                  |

## Quick steps
1. Circle a UI element, assign a letter (A, B, C…).
2. Quote or paraphrase the relevant ISO clause.
3. Describe the user or business impact in one sentence.
4. Rate severity collaboratively.
